%%{init: {'theme': 'dark', 'themeVariables': { 'primaryColor': '#10b981'}}}%% sequenceDiagram autonumber participant R as ğŸ–¼ï¸ Renderer
(renderer.js) participant P as ğŸ“¡ Preload
(preload.js) participant M as ğŸ–¥ï¸ Main
(index.js) participant S as âš™ï¸ Services participant MCP as ğŸ¤– MCP Servers participant LM as ğŸ§  LM Studio Note over R,LM: Application Initialization R->>P: DOMContentLoaded P->>M: ipcRenderer.invoke('get-version') M-->>P: { version: '2.0.6' } P-->>R: version R->>P: Initialize LM Studio P->>M: ipcRenderer.invoke('lm-studio-connect', url) M->>S: lmStudioClient.connect(url) S->>LM: HTTP GET /v1/models LM-->>S: { models: [...] } S-->>M: { connected: true, models } M-->>P: status P-->>R: Update UI Note over R,LM: Chat Message Flow R->>P: User sends chat message P->>M: ipcRenderer.invoke('chatbot-message', msg) M->>S: chatbotService.processMessage(msg) alt Intent: Knowledge Query S->>MCP: evony_search(query) MCP-->>S: { results: [...] } else Intent: Calculation S->>MCP: calc_training(params) MCP-->>S: { result: {...} } else Intent: Protocol S->>MCP: protocol_lookup(id) MCP-->>S: { action: {...} } end S->>S: Build context from MCP results S->>LM: POST /v1/chat/completions LM-->>S: { response: '...' } S-->>M: formatted response M-->>P: response P-->>R: Display in chat Note over R,LM: Traffic Capture Flow R->>P: Webview traffic detected P->>M: ipcRenderer.send('traffic-captured', packet) M->>S: proxyMonitor.processPacket(packet) S->>S: Decode AMF3 S->>S: Identify action S->>S: Update game state M->>P: mainWindow.webContents.send('traffic-update', entry) P->>R: Update traffic list Note over R,LM: Settings Flow R->>P: User saves settings P->>M: ipcRenderer.invoke('save-settings', settings) M->>S: store.set(settings) M->>S: lmStudioClient.updateSettings(settings.lmStudio) S->>LM: Reconnect if URL changed M-->>P: { success: true } P-->>R: Show confirmation
